member.name: T:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an output adapter that publishes measurements to openHistorian for archival.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.InstanceName
member.summary: Gets or sets instance name defined for this .

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.ArchiveLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets archive path for this .

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.ConnectionInfo
member.summary: Gets connection info for adapter, if any.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.ArchiveOffloadLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets archive offload path for this .

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.PublicationInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the publication interval for this .

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.StartTimeConstraint
member.summary: Gets the start time for reading data.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.StopTimeConstraint
member.summary: Gets the stop time for reading data.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.SimulateTimestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether timestamps are simulated for the purposes of real-time concentration.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.AutoRepeat
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determines if the input data should be replayed repeatedly.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.ProcessingInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired processing interval, in milliseconds, for the adapter.
member.remarks: With the exception of the values of -1 and 0, this value specifies the desired processing interval for data, i.e., basically a delay, or timer interval, over which to process data. A value of -1 means to use the default processing interval while a value of 0 means to process data as fast as possible.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data input source.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.LocalInputAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of connection used to connect to the openHistorian.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the listener will initiate the connection to the openHistorian.

member.name: T:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an output adapter that publishes measurements to openHistorian for archival.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.Server
member.summary: Gets or sets the host name for the server hosting the remote historian.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port on which the remote historian is listening.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.PayloadAware
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the payload boundaries are to be preserved during transmission.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.ConserveBandwidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that determines the packet type to be used when sending data to the server.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Returns a flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.ThrottleTransmission
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that determines whether to wait for acknowledgment from the historian that the last set of points have been received before attempting to send the next set of points.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.SamplesPerTransmission
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer that indicates the maximum number of points to be published to the historian at once.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data output source.

member.name: T:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader
member.summary: Reads certain device and input stream statistics from the statistics archive. The statistics that are read are the total frame count, the missing frame count, connectivity, average latency, the actual data rate, data quality errors, and time quality errors.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class. All parameters--, , , , , and --must be set manually before attempting to read statistics from the archive.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class. The configuration file specified in the parameter must contain the statistics historian records in order to automatically locate the archive files. Otherwise, the other constructor should be used. The and parameters are not set when using this constructor and must be set manually before attempting to read statistics from the archive.
member.param: Path to the source configuration file.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.ArchiveFilePath
member.summary: Path to the archive file (*_archive.d).

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.StateFilePath
member.summary: Path to the state file (*_startup.dat).

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.IntercomFilePath
member.summary: Path to the intercom file (scratch.dat).

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.MetadataFilePath
member.summary: Path to the metadata file (*_dbase.dat).

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.StartTime
member.summary: The timestamp at which to start gathering statistics from the archive.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.EndTime
member.summary: The timestamp at which to stop gathering statistics from the archive.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.TotalFrames
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on the total number of frames.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.MissingFrames
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on missing frames.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.ConnectedStats
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on input stream connectivity.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.AverageLatency
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on the average latency.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.ActualDataRate
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on the actual data rate.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.DataQualityErrors
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on data quality errors.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.TimeQualityErrors
member.summary: After the has read statistics from the archive file, this will contain the statistics on time quality errors.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.Open
member.summary: Causes the to open the archive file and retrieve the statistics.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.Close
member.summary: Closes the archive file once the statistics are no longer needed.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by the object.

member.name: M:HistorianAdapters.StatisticsReader.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
